body.p: An entity shall recognise the expected cost of profit‑sharing and bonus payments under paragraph 11 when, and only when:

li.p: the entity has a present legal or constructive obligation to make such payments as a result of past events; and
a reliable estimate of the obligation can be made.

body.p: A present obligation exists when, and only when, the entity has no realistic alternative but to make the payments.
